subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: When five players on the Maple Leafs refused to waive no-trade clauses in their contracts so they could stay in Toronto, they were criticized for supposedly putting their own interest ahead of the team’s.
snippet: When five players on the Maple Leafs refused to waive no-trade clauses in their contracts so they could stay in Toronto, they were criticized for supposedly putting their own interest ahead of the team’s.
